body.raw:
{
	"groupName":"NET131",
	"type":"lan",
	"_comment":"Below enter UUID of site where subnet should be reserved",
	"siteId":"{{SITE_UUID}}",
	"ipPools":[
		{
			"_comment":"Below enter global IPv4 address pool UUID from which subnets should be reserved",
			"parentUuid":"{{POOL_OVERLAY_UUID}}",
			"dhcpServerIps":["10.16.2.3"],
			"dnsServerIps":["8.8.8.8"],
			"ipPoolOwner":"DNAC",
			"shared":true,
			"gateways":["10.1{{POD}}.131.1"],
			"ipPoolCidr":"10.1{{POD}}.131.0/24"
		},
		{
			"_comment":"Below enter global IPv6 address pool UUID from which subnets should be reserved",
			"parentUuid":"{{POOL6_OVERLAY_UUID}}",
			"dhcpServerIps":[],
			"dnsServerIps":["2001:4860:4860::8888"],
			"ipPoolOwner":"DNAC",
			"shared":true,
			"gateways":["2001:db8:1{{POD}}:131::1"],
			"ipPoolCidr":"2001:db8:1{{POD}}:131::/64",
			"context":[
				{
					"owner":"DNAC",
					"contextKey":"slaacSupport",
					"contextValue":true
				}
			]
		}
	]
}
